thread.title: A cozy little place for business travel
thread.title_full: A cozy little place for business travel - Review of Mercure London Paddington Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: traveljtravel
title: A cozy little place for business travel
text:
Location Location Location. Right next to Paddington Tube Station with all restaurants bars next to it. Very near to St. Marys Hospital. Cozy and clean place and all required amenities in the room. Helpful staff.
Room Tip: Try for the rooms on higher floors with a window to the road. See more room tips
